name: ActivitySuggester
0:
”Alexa open activity suggester”
”Alexa ask activity suggester for an activity”
”Alexa ask activity suggester a new activity”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: activity suggester
des:
Do you ever feel like you don't know what to do or are just bored of the same old stuff?
Don't worry! Just tell your Alexa: "Alexa ask Activity Suggester for a new activity" and you'll have something to do for a whole year thanks to our 50+ activites (Even more with the next updates).

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
